paper_keywords: Multilinear and mixed multilateral generating functions
paper_abstract: The main purpose of this paper is to present various families of generating functions for a class of polynomials in two variables. Furthermore, several general classes of bilinear, bilateral or mixed multilateral generating functions are obtained for these polynomials. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some families of generating functions for a class of bivariate polynomials
